Literature.Title: Characterization and Antimicrobial Studies of Iturin-Like and Bogorol-Like Lipopeptides From Brevibacillus spp. Strains GI9 and SKDU10
Literature.Author: Singh SS, Sharma D, Baindara P, Choksket S, Harshvardhan, Mandal SM, Grover V, Korpole S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 1430(MIC=150-170µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes MTCC 839(MIC=200-220µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 121(MIC=260-270µg/ml),Vibrio cholerae MTCC 3904(MIC=105-115µg/ml),Candida tropicalis MTCC 184(MIC=150-160µg/ml),Candida glabrata MTCC 3019(MIC=190-210µg/ml),Candida haemulonii MTCC 2766(MIC=300-320µg/ml),Candida inconspicua MTCC 1074(MIC=140-160µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 183(MIC=90-100µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 1637(MIC=140-160µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 227(MIC=140-150µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=150-160µg/ml),Candida auris(MIC=90-100µg/ml),Candida rugosa(MIC=40-60µg/ml),Candida kefyr(MIC=150-160µg/ml),Candida krusei(MIC=100-120µg/ml),Colletotrichum acutatum MTCC 1037(MIC=390-410µg/ml),Fusarium verticillioides MTCC 158(MIC=490-520µg/ml),Alternaria brassicicola MTCC 2102(MIC=430-480µg/ml)
